article_title: Akin Gump Snags Former White House Adviser
article_text:
Akin Gump Snags Former White House Adviser

Law360, New York (March 4, 2014, 1:48 PM ET) -- Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP has hired a former White House deputy assistant to the president for legislative affairs, who has experience working on patent reform, data breach legislation and the Affordable Care Act, to join its policy practice in Washington, the firm said Tuesday.



Ed Pagano, who served as chief of staff for Sen. Patrick Leahy, D-Vt., before joining the Obama administration for the past two years to manage the White House Senate Legislative Affairs Office, joined Akin’s public law and policy practice...
